content.rendered:
The La Verne Academy gives annual grants to “La Verne Scholars,” who consist of tenure-track faculty who have passed their third-year review and have demonstrated promising scholarship, as deemed by La Verne Academy members. From two to four La Verne Scholars are typically chosen each year, and awardees receive cash awards to further their research goals.
